# Cohviz

The goal of cohviz is to provide researchers and  teachers with a set of instructional feedback tools on text cohesion.

## Installation

You can install cohviz from github with:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("ch-bu/cohviz-r")
```
